page.title: 14NEW MOTORWAYS NEAR EPPING
page.content: Many people living near the M25 between{Theydon Garnon}and{Waltham {Abbey}are angry about the concrete surface and the noise it makes.The motorway is particularly noisy between 5a.m.and 10a.m.when the wind is blowing south_ west.As a result of a public outcry in 1974,the{Bell Common {tunnel}was built underneath Epping Forest.It cost between{25}and{35 million pounds.On top of the tunnel is a cricket pitch which was spoilt in the process of constructing the tunnel.It has been rebuilt with a magnificent pavilion, but it will not be ready until the summer of 1986.Motorways are very useful for communication. As Mr and Mrs Holland of Ladderstile Farm said,"We like the motorway because you can travel {quickly and easily}to your destination but the M25 doesn't please everyone."
